transcript.text: halleluyah halleluyah the seventh day a
UCLA number seven is the perfect number
tied to Sabbath but this was the seventh
day since November 19th that I was out
here and Sam got a real full healing
spiritually some of you don't understand
but when someone who proclaims to love
Christ is not walking in holiness as Sam
confessed to me last week and even
started defending his sin after I prayed
for him once someone who proclaims to be
a lover of Messiah actually totally
gives himself to the Messiah and starts
living holy in other word is fully
filled with the spirit covered in the
blood and can say like David said in
psalm 119 I will keep your Commandments
I will not forsake your word and that is
what Sam said to me today rather than
defending us in like you did last week
now under the power of the Spirit he
said yes Daniel thank you for praying
for me and I have forsaken that sin and
I will love Jesus with everything in me
maybe he'll get healed from that
wheelchair maybe not but to me this was
a far greater victory because now with
him being totally sold out for Messiah
and with the influence that he has here
at UCLA he's been here for three years
he's now a senior in his fourth year and
he's connected to a lot of different
Christian groups who have quite frankly
been layered I seen and lukewarm I can
tell you right now Sam's no longer
lukewarm that's the healing we need it's
so beautiful it's been raining and and
so the pavement is kind of glistening in
the Sun
it's just so beautiful
liquid golden light reflecting
there was a part over here that I wanted
to show
that could golden light out Allu yeah I
want to thank you guys for praying for
this campus praying for UCLA this
seventh day that I've been here I was
here three days last week and then there
was the Thanksgiving break and now four
days this week so now it's the seventh
day and it's been amazing it's been
amazing
[Music]
only Yahshua can do this and I always
pray that I never want to go out
preaching without a spirit you know
right before I started preaching my
throat was so bad I literally I was like
I can't do this and yet as soon as open
my mouth my voice was fine it was fine
it didn't even sound like this you heard
me I was loudly proclaiming the truth in
that central square of the quad there at
UCLA I mean it was beautiful
that's Yahshua that's his spirit
hallelujah so people have been
complaining about the equipment I have
I've made this explanation many times
but people don't seem to listen the
video that I have the video Kim that I
have is not compatible with a wireless
mic I did this full investigation yes
last week it's not compatible from
wireless mic and when I was told by the
tech guys and my and I went to Best Buy
I talked to theirs the tech crew here
UCLA I have to buy a camcorder which is
like about two hundred forty two hundred
fifty dollars and then you have to buy a
bike to go with that which is another
150 so it's like four hundred dollars so
there is a subscriber who basically
donated seventy five dollars to my
paypal and specifically noted in his
PayPal that may should be used this
toward buying that equipment so when you
do make a donation you can specifically
say what you want it for and if you want
it for this equipment then I'll put it
toward that but I just don't have that
type of money to spend on that type of
equipment right now so that's that's
just the honest truth everything I do is
free I'm never gonna charge for the
gospel that's what that's what Keith
Green did and quite frankly that's what
the Scriptures tell us that's what all
the apostles are that's what they did
they didn't do anything for money they
preached freely freely I've received
freely I give so people have to
voluntarily send stuff I'm not going to
charge that this stuff it's it's
but praise yeah what a glorious day
what a glorious glorious day the rain
fell now it's a beautiful blue sky
that's all the air is clear and what has
